column4: hi. i have a LAN and a printer connected to one of the ubuntu computers. one of the computers in network has win xp. how should i share the printer to other computers?
it sounds like you want to be using a combination of samba and cups to get the job done.
alright. i found this https://help.ubuntu.com/community/NetworkPrintingWithUbuntu . is it applicable to dapper?
I feel that https://help.ubuntu.com/community/NetworkPrintingFromWinXP  may contain your answer, but I have not actually shared a printer myself
